login.line8: just a couple of clicks and we start

forgetpwd.line1: A temporary password has been sent to your email.
forgetpwd.line2: Login with this temporary password, and feel free to use it to reset a new password if you wish.
forgetpwd.line4: Kindly enter your email address below
forgetpwd.line5: If email is correct, you would receive a temporary password that would be used to set a new password

all-prod.after-adding: After adding the product you will receive a unique link to the sales page. You can put it on your website or in the store.
all-prod.integrate-info: If you want to integrate the Automater platform with your online store or sell products through the sales sub page, you must first add them to the system.

delete.sure: Are you sure you want to be delete

productDetails.buyProductLink: Your product can be purchased at

newProduct.description: Product description will be found in transaction website. Add the most important information about your product here.
newProduct.chooseLayout: Choose layout from which settings will be submitted to monitoring.
newProduct.addNewLayout: Click here to add new settings layout.
newProduct.chooseCodebase: Choose codebase from which codes will be sent to customers.
newProduct.addNewCodebase: Click here to add new codebase.

trademarksAndInfringements.content: In the names, product descriptions and photos, you can not use registered trademarks of companies (eg Netflix Inc.). Shops that break this prohibition will be automatically blocked.

advancedIntegration.contactUs: In case of problems with integration contact us.

new-payment-method.selectAccountType: Select the payment Operator you want to connect your account with
new-payment-method.paymentMethodsDesc: You can connect your Automater account with a payment operator to allow the sale of products through the online store.
new-payment-method.connectedPaymentAccounts: Connected payment accounts are used for payments to be made via the online store in Automater and through the shopping website.
new-payment-method.usingOwnOnlineStore: If you are using your own online store (e.g. Magento or Shoper.pl), do not add an account here. Payments are then made directly by the shop.

storeConfiguration.recommendedLogoSize: Recommended size of the logo is 200px x 48px. Larger files will be scaled to 48px height.
storeConfiguration.advancedIntegrationDetails: For advanced integration we recommend solutions using our API
storeConfiguration.processOrderOnWebsite: If you want process of order to appear on your website, learn easier integration procedure:
storeConfiguration.integrationProblem: In case of problems with integration contact us.

newBaseCodes.name: Name
newBaseCodes.title: Code bases
newBaseCodes.description: Codebases store codes and files, which are then sent to the client.
newBaseCodes.standard: Standard base: one code to one customer (e.g.: when you are selling top-up cards)
newBaseCodes.recursive: Recursive codebase: allows you to send the same code to all customers (e.g.: when you are selling eBooks)
newBaseCodes.multiBase: Multibase: allows your customer to select base from which he wants to get code (e.g.: when you are selling 10 games in 1 auction)

codeList.use: are used to store the codes and files that you want to sell.

codeBaseExport.description: You can generate export of selected code bases. The export file will be generated and sent in ZIP format to the e-mail address provided. The sent archive will contain text files with codes that have not been used and are currently in the database.
codeBaseExport.selectCodeBases: Select code bases for export (select all):
codeBaseExport.emailAddress: Email address to send message with copy:
